findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of token swaps.
findings.function: swapETHForTokens, swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any access modifiers or protection mechanisms, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor function of a contract is unprotected and can be called multiple times, leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized changes to allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to mint tokens without authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
